name: The SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA, Walter D. Palmer Leadership Learning Partners Charter School v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION. Petition of Walter D. Palmer Leadership Learning Partners Charter School
name_abbreviation: School District v. Department of Education

parties: The SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA, Walter D. Palmer Leadership Learning Partners Charter School v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION. Petition of Walter D. Palmer Leadership Learning Partners Charter School.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of August, 2012, the Application for Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

52 A.3d 221
